attributes.contentHtml:
I honestly don't even know what to think about this.
Khootiee has also provided me with some "evidence" in DMs, saying that he's the one that's innocent, and that the only reason he behaves like this is because vanish was the reason Hetzner suspended their servers, and he was also insulting Duxlolz because, well, "I wasn't in the mood".

I don't know who to trust anymore in this, after khootiee told me the reason he's so mad about all of this and why he demoted all staffs.

I don't have an opinion on this yet - but for now, i'll just be waiting.
I also got banned from CloudMC's Discord server! It was made by Latvis - after I didn't want the chat to get deleted by him, so I jokingly said that I would "find him and do something bad with him", and this isn't really even against the rules of the server.
At first, Latvis said that "no, he wouldn't get banned" after he got asked by a booster, and then, 1 minute later said "though he will get banned because this is enough". (sentences not fully accurate)

If there is something that you could add to this, please make sure to reply to this post. Like it or not, but I'm the Switzerland for now.

attributes.title: khootiee aka Crac, being a dick and unprofessional
